featured.text: He is also aware that every citizen must do his part if the nation is to 40 .
Fashion designer Tommy Hilfiger was fully aware of the power of youth culture.
The visitors would be even more startled if they were fully aware of all the existing similarities between them and these animals.
These folk healers also use observation and logic, but they are not so aware of it.
There isn’t a brand or a trend that these young people are not aware of.

definition.zh_def: 意識到的，知道的，對某事有認識的。
definition.en_def: Having knowledge or perception of a situation or fact.
definition.example: She was aware of the risks involved in the project.
